translations: n.[植] 耳状报春花；[解剖] 耳廓

phrs.translation: 耳状报春花, 心耳, 心房
木耳, 槐耳粉末, 槐耳提取物

sentences.sentence: Meanwhile Rutongan tablets reduced the auricula swelling in mice(P<0.05) and foot-plate swelling in rats (P<0.01) .
sentences.translation: 高剂量乳痛安片可使小鼠耳廓肿胀度清楚减小（P<0.05），同时足肿胀度也清楚减小（P<0.01）。

sentences.sentence: The pheromone receptor of Auricularia auricula was similar to counterparts of tetrapolar basidiomycetes on the basis of BLAST results.
sentences.translation: BLAST搜索结果表明，该信息素受体片段更加类似于四极性担子菌。

sentences.sentence: The results show the infrared spectrum of Auricularia auricula is mainly composed of the absorption of protein, aliphatic compound and polysaccharide.
sentences.translation: 结果显示，它们的红外光谱主要由蛋白质、脂类化合物及多糖的振动吸收谱带组成。
